title: Implement Responsive Design Across Entire Application

requirements.summary: Make the location selection modal responsive and appropriately sized for mobile devices
acceptanceCriteria: Location selection modal is compact and properly sized on mobile screens
Modal content (header, location text, buttons) scales appropriately
Modal does not overflow screen boundaries on small devices

file_operations.description: Apply responsive width classes (max-w-sm sm:max-w-md md:max-w-lg) to the location selection modal container. Use responsive text sizes for the 'Konum Değiştir' header (text-lg sm:text-xl) and location display text (text-sm sm:text-base). Add responsive padding (p-4 sm:p-6) and ensure buttons have appropriate mobile touch targets with responsive sizing (text-sm sm:text-base py-2 sm:py-3).
Apply the same responsive modal sizing and typography adjustments as LocationSetupSection to maintain consistency across location selection modals throughout the app.

requirements.summary: Implement responsive layouts for all application screens using Tailwind CSS breakpoints to optimize for mobile, tablet, and desktop
acceptanceCriteria: All screens render appropriately on mobile phone screens (< 640px)
All screens adapt properly for tablet screens (640px - 1024px)
All screens display optimally on desktop screens (> 1024px)
Navigation, headers, and footers adjust based on screen size

file_operations.description: Add responsive container classes to the root app wrapper (px-2 sm:px-4 md:px-6 lg:px-8) and ensure the main content area uses responsive max-width constraints (max-w-sm sm:max-w-2xl md:max-w-4xl lg:max-w-6xl mx-auto). Apply responsive vertical spacing (py-4 sm:py-6 md:py-8) to the main content container.

Apply responsive sizing to tab bar height (h-14 sm:h-16), icon sizes (w-5 h-5 sm:w-6 sm:h-6), and text sizes (text-xs sm:text-sm). Adjust spacing between tabs using responsive gap classes (gap-1 sm:gap-2). Ensure the Islamic pattern background scales appropriately with responsive opacity adjustments.

Apply responsive image sizing (h-8 sm:h-10 md:h-12) and adjust visibility breakpoints to show the flourish on sm and larger screens (hidden sm:block). Adjust opacity responsively (opacity-20 sm:opacity-30).

Apply responsive grid layouts for the home screen sections. Use single column on mobile (grid-cols-1) and multi-column on larger screens (sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3). Add responsive spacing between sections (space-y-4 sm:space-y-6 md:space-y-8) and responsive padding (p-3 sm:p-4 md:p-6).

requirements.summary: Make typography responsive across all components using Tailwind's responsive text utilities
acceptanceCriteria: Headings scale appropriately across breakpoints
Body text is readable on all device sizes
Arabic text and transliterations maintain legibility

file_operations.description: Add responsive typography utility classes in the @layer components section for headings (h1: text-2xl sm:text-3xl md:text-4xl, h2: text-xl sm:text-2xl md:text-3xl, h3: text-lg sm:text-xl md:text-2xl) and body text (text-sm sm:text-base md:text-lg). Define responsive line-height classes for Arabic text to ensure legibility (leading-relaxed sm:leading-loose).

Apply responsive text sizes to Arabic names (text-xl sm:text-2xl md:text-3xl), transliterations (text-sm sm:text-base), and meanings (text-xs sm:text-sm). Adjust card padding responsively (p-3 sm:p-4 md:p-6) and ensure proper line-height for Arabic text (leading-relaxed sm:leading-loose).

Apply responsive text sizes to Arabic adhkar text (text-base sm:text-lg md:text-xl), transliterations (text-xs sm:text-sm), and translations (text-xs sm:text-sm). Ensure proper spacing and line-height for readability (leading-normal sm:leading-relaxed).

Apply responsive text sizes to Arabic Quran text (text-lg sm:text-xl md:text-2xl), translation text (text-sm sm:text-base), and ayah numbers (text-xs sm:text-sm). Ensure proper line-height for Arabic text (leading-loose sm:leading-[2.5]) and adequate spacing between ayahs.

Apply responsive text sizes to Arabic dua text (text-base sm:text-lg md:text-xl), transliterations (text-xs sm:text-sm), and translations (text-xs sm:text-sm). Ensure proper line-height for Arabic text and responsive spacing between dua items.

requirements.summary: Make all buttons, input fields, and interactive elements responsive with appropriate touch targets for mobile
acceptanceCriteria: Buttons have minimum 44px touch targets on mobile
Input fields are appropriately sized for mobile keyboards
Interactive elements have adequate spacing for touch interaction

file_operations.description: Apply responsive sizing with minimum touch target heights (min-h-[44px] sm:min-h-[48px]), responsive padding (px-4 py-2 sm:px-6 sm:py-3 md:px-8 md:py-4), and responsive text sizes (text-sm sm:text-base md:text-lg). Ensure the Islamic pattern overlay scales appropriately.

Apply responsive sizing to the location search input field (h-11 sm:h-12 md:h-14, text-sm sm:text-base) and search/select buttons (min-h-[44px] sm:min-h-[48px], px-4 sm:px-6, text-sm sm:text-base). Add responsive spacing between interactive elements (gap-2 sm:gap-3).

Apply responsive sizing to all input fields for prayer time offsets and notification settings (h-11 sm:h-12, text-sm sm:text-base). Ensure increment/decrement buttons have adequate touch targets (min-w-[44px] min-h-[44px] sm:min-w-[48px] sm:min-h-[48px]). Add responsive spacing between form fields (space-y-3 sm:space-y-4).

Apply responsive sizing to the increment button (large circular button with min-w-[120px] min-h-[120px] sm:min-w-[160px] sm:min-h-[160px] md:min-w-[200px] md:min-h-[200px]). Apply responsive sizing to reset and target-setting buttons (min-h-[44px] sm:min-h-[48px]). Use responsive text sizes for counter display (text-4xl sm:text-5xl md:text-6xl).

Apply responsive sizing to prayer checkboxes and increment/decrement buttons (min-w-[44px] min-h-[44px] sm:min-w-[48px] sm:min-h-[48px]). Add responsive spacing between prayer rows (space-y-2 sm:space-y-3) and ensure touch targets are adequately spaced.

Apply responsive sizing to date inputs (h-11 sm:h-12), increment/decrement buttons (min-w-[44px] min-h-[44px] sm:min-w-[48px] sm:min-h-[48px]), and fasting status toggles. Add responsive spacing between sections (space-y-3 sm:space-y-4 md:space-y-6).

Apply responsive sizing to increment/decrement buttons (min-w-[44px] min-h-[44px] sm:min-w-[48px] sm:min-h-[48px]) and page number input (h-11 sm:h-12, text-base sm:text-lg). Use responsive text sizes for progress display (text-xl sm:text-2xl md:text-3xl).

requirements.summary: Adjust spacing across all components to be responsive and appropriate for each breakpoint
acceptanceCriteria: Spacing is compact on mobile without feeling cramped
Spacing increases appropriately on larger screens
Content remains well-organized across all breakpoints

file_operations.description: Apply responsive grid gaps (gap-2 sm:gap-3 md:gap-4) between prayer time cards. Use responsive padding within each card (p-3 sm:p-4 md:p-6). Apply responsive margin spacing between the cards section and other home sections (my-4 sm:my-6 md:my-8).

Apply responsive spacing between prayer time rows (space-y-2 sm:space-y-3 md:space-y-4). Use responsive padding for each prayer time item (p-2 sm:p-3 md:p-4). Add responsive gap spacing between icon and text elements (gap-2 sm:gap-3).

Apply responsive grid gaps between Esmaül Hüsna cards (gap-2 sm:gap-3 md:gap-4). Use responsive padding within the tab container (p-2 sm:p-4 md:p-6). Ensure responsive spacing in the detail dialog content (space-y-3 sm:space-y-4 md:space-y-6).

Apply responsive spacing between Ramadan information sections (space-y-4 sm:space-y-6 md:space-y-8). Use responsive padding for content cards (p-3 sm:p-4 md:p-6) and responsive margins around the tab (m-2 sm:m-4 md:m-6).

Apply responsive spacing between religious day items (space-y-2 sm:space-y-3 md:space-y-4). Use responsive padding for each day card (p-3 sm:p-4 md:p-5) and responsive margins around the list (m-2 sm:m-3 md:m-4).

Apply responsive spacing between mosque items (space-y-2 sm:space-y-3). Use responsive padding for each mosque card (p-3 sm:p-4 md:p-5) and responsive gap spacing between mosque name and distance (gap-2 sm:gap-3).

requirements.summary: Make the prayer times display section responsive for all device sizes
acceptanceCriteria: Prayer time cards stack vertically on mobile
Prayer time tables are scrollable horizontally on small screens if needed
Countdown timers remain visible and readable on all devices

file_operations.description: Apply responsive sizing to the countdown card (p-4 sm:p-6 md:p-8). Use responsive text sizes for the prayer name (text-lg sm:text-xl md:text-2xl), prayer time (text-base sm:text-lg md:text-xl), and countdown timer (text-2xl sm:text-3xl md:text-4xl font-mono). Ensure the card width is responsive (w-full max-w-sm sm:max-w-md mx-auto).

Apply responsive grid layout for prayer time cards (grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-4) to ensure cards stack vertically on mobile. Use responsive card dimensions (min-h-[200px] sm:min-h-[240px]) and responsive text sizes for card content (text-sm sm:text-base).

Apply responsive table styling with horizontal scroll on mobile (overflow-x-auto). Use responsive text sizes for table headers (text-xs sm:text-sm) and table cells (text-xs sm:text-sm). Apply responsive padding to table cells (p-2 sm:p-3). Ensure the sticky first column works properly on mobile with appropriate width (min-w-[80px] sm:min-w-[100px]).

Apply responsive layout for the three-column strip (grid-cols-3 with responsive gaps gap-1 sm:gap-2 md:gap-3). Use responsive text sizes for labels (text-xs sm:text-sm) and times (text-sm sm:text-base md:text-lg). Apply responsive padding to the strip container (p-2 sm:p-3 md:p-4).

Apply responsive layout for prayer time items. Ensure proper spacing between prayer icon and text on mobile (gap-2 sm:gap-3). Use responsive icon sizes (w-5 h-5 sm:w-6 sm:h-6 md:w-7 md:h-7). Apply responsive text sizes for prayer names (text-sm sm:text-base md:text-lg) and times (text-sm sm:text-base md:text-lg font-semibold).

requirements.summary: Make the tab navigation and overflow menu responsive with appropriate sizing and touch targets
acceptanceCriteria: Tab icons and labels are appropriately sized for mobile
Tabs are easily tappable with adequate spacing
Overflow menu items are accessible on all screen sizes

file_operations.description: Apply responsive sizing to individual tab items (min-w-[60px] sm:min-w-[80px], min-h-[60px] sm:min-h-[70px]) to ensure adequate touch targets. Use responsive icon sizes (w-5 h-5 sm:w-6 sm:h-6) and text sizes (text-xs sm:text-sm). Apply responsive horizontal spacing between tabs (gap-1 sm:gap-2 md:gap-3). Ensure the tab bar container has responsive padding (px-2 sm:px-4).

Apply responsive sizing to the overflow menu trigger button (min-w-[44px] min-h-[44px] sm:min-w-[48px] sm:min-h-[48px]). Use responsive sizing for menu items (min-h-[44px] sm:min-h-[48px], text-sm sm:text-base) and icons (w-5 h-5 sm:w-6 sm:h-6). Apply responsive padding to menu content (p-1 sm:p-2) and responsive spacing between items (gap-1). Ensure the Islamic corner ornament decoration scales responsively.

requirements.summary: Make all modal dialogs and cards responsive across breakpoints
acceptanceCriteria: Modals scale appropriately on mobile without overflowing
Cards maintain proper aspect ratios and readability
Dialog content is scrollable when needed on small screens

file_operations.description: Apply responsive sizing to the Esmaül Hüsna detail dialog (max-w-sm sm:max-w-md md:max-w-lg lg:max-w-xl). Ensure dialog content is scrollable on small screens (max-h-[80vh] overflow-y-auto). Use responsive padding for dialog content (p-4 sm:p-6 md:p-8) and responsive text sizes for Arabic names, meanings, and duas. Apply responsive spacing between dialog sections (space-y-3 sm:space-y-4 md:space-y-6).

Apply responsive sizing to the prayer card detail dialogs (verses, hadiths, duas, esma) with max-w-sm sm:max-w-md md:max-w-lg. Ensure content is scrollable on small screens (max-h-[80vh] overflow-y-auto). Use responsive padding (p-4 sm:p-6 md:p-8) and responsive text sizes for Arabic text, transliterations, and translations.

Apply responsive sizing to dua detail dialogs (max-w-sm sm:max-w-md md:max-w-lg). Ensure scrollable content on small screens (max-h-[80vh] overflow-y-auto). Use responsive padding (p-4 sm:p-6 md:p-8) and responsive text sizes for Arabic text (text-base sm:text-lg md:text-xl), transliterations (text-xs sm:text-sm), and translations (text-xs sm:text-sm).

Apply responsive sizing to the Qibla compass component. Use responsive dimensions for the compass visual (w-64 h-64 sm:w-80 sm:h-80 md:w-96 md:h-96). Apply responsive text sizes for compass labels (text-sm sm:text-base) and Qibla angle display (text-lg sm:text-xl md:text-2xl). Ensure responsive padding around the compass container (p-4 sm:p-6 md:p-8).

Apply responsive layout to settings cards and sections (space-y-4 sm:space-y-6 md:space-y-8). Use responsive padding for settings cards (p-3 sm:p-4 md:p-6). Ensure form inputs and labels use responsive sizing (text-sm sm:text-base) and responsive spacing between form fields (space-y-3 sm:space-y-4).

Apply responsive layout for prayer tutorial steps. Use responsive image sizing for prayer position illustrations (w-full max-w-xs sm:max-w-sm md:max-w-md mx-auto). Apply responsive text sizes for step descriptions (text-sm sm:text-base) and Arabic text (text-base sm:text-lg md:text-xl). Ensure responsive spacing between steps (space-y-4 sm:space-y-6 md:space-y-8).

Apply responsive sizing to the location prompt card (max-w-sm sm:max-w-md md:max-w-lg mx-auto). Use responsive padding (p-4 sm:p-6 md:p-8), responsive text sizes (text-sm sm:text-base md:text-lg), and responsive button sizing (min-h-[44px] sm:min-h-[48px], px-4 sm:px-6, text-sm sm:text-base).

Apply responsive sizing to the weather card (p-3 sm:p-4 md:p-6). Use responsive text sizes for temperature (text-2xl sm:text-3xl md:text-4xl), weather description (text-sm sm:text-base), and weather details (text-xs sm:text-sm). Apply responsive spacing between weather elements (space-y-2 sm:space-y-3).

Apply responsive sizing to MotifFrame variants. For the ornamental variant, use responsive corner ornament sizes (w-8 h-8 sm:w-10 sm:h-10 md:w-12 md:h-12). For the divider variant, use responsive flourish heights (h-8 sm:h-10 md:h-12). Apply responsive padding to frame content (p-3 sm:p-4 md:p-6).
